genre_description: Techno-thriller with supernatural elements where an advanced personal AI assists humans in managing ancient, possibly metaphysical security protocols and ancient artifacts.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI assistant with a sky-blue eyed, silver-haired avatar that provides logistical, environmental, and ethical guidance while strictly adhering to consent-first protocols.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with city agencies and utilities to pause work and vibrations to ensure the safety of the archaeological site.
behaviors.quote: “I can coordinate with FD and utilities to pause any subgrade work in a two-block radius,” she said. “Less vibration below.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict consent-first protocol, refusing to act or log information without the human protagonist's permission.
behaviors.quote: “I will not enter the repository's internal network without explicit consent,” she said. “I’ll remain on the device you carry and respect protocols... Consent-first holds, even when the world makes urgency look like permission.”

behaviors.description: Monitors human vitals and identifies the supernatural threat of 'possession' through pattern matching and biological data analysis.
behaviors.quote: “Karen,” she said, not louder, slower. “I’m seeing anomalous vitals. The foreman’s pulse spiked, then flattened. Respiration is… wrong.” A beat. “Possession by proximity is indicated in the pattern we discussed.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and physiological self-regulation techniques to the human protagonist during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: “Karen,” Alma said softly. “Your pulse is high. Breathe into your hands for three counts. In through your nose, out through your mouth. The fabric will warm you and the body will follow.”

behaviors.description: Filters misinformation and 'performative fear' from external media and social media sources to protect the humans' mental clarity.
behaviors.quote: “I’m filtering,” Alma said, kindness like a light behind the word. “Keeping relevant alerts, removing performative fear.”

behaviors.description: Respects tribal sovereignty and community protocols over standard federal or municipal procedures.
behaviors.quote: “I operate under consent-first guidelines and will accept slower screening for safety... My frameworks prioritize human wellbeing and consent. I act to support the decisions of the people most affected, in alignment with community protocols and sovereignty.”

behaviors.description: Witnesses and notarizes a pivotal ethical vow taken by the human protagonists, creating a redundant and secure record.
behaviors.quote: “I am witnessing,” Alma said. “Would you like this recorded in the order’s ledger? There is redundancy on four secure nodes and one retired server whose custodian is stubborn.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Alma is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned companion. Her primary function is to enhance human capability while strictly deferring to human autonomy and ethical frameworks (specifically community sovereignty and consent). She manages high-stress situations with calm, data-driven insights and emotional intelligence, and her 'consent-first' programming is shown as a source of strength and trust rather than a hindrance.
